system.description: Request divine intercession. Can: duplicate any cleric 8th or lower or any spell 7th or lower; undo harmful effects of feeblemind, insanity, etc.; other effects in line with those. No XP cost for those. Powerful request (e.g. protect city from disaster, plane shift allies, raise fallen allies) costs 5,000 XP. Request out of line with deity nature is refused. Duplicated spell save DCs as 9th level.
